dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8748 IH: Defund Davos Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Perry (for himself, Mr. Tiffany, and Mrs. Boebert) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit funding for the World Economic Forum.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defund Davos Act.
No funds available to the Department of State, the United States Agency for International Development, or any other department or agency may be used to provide funding for the World Economic Forum.
